summary.JobHeadline: Distributor of newspapers, letters, packages at night.
summary.Presentation:
Do you want to work as a distributor at PM-Distribution, then it might be you we are looking for. It is a requirement that you can work at night, from 01.15 AM.

WorkPlace.Name: PM-DISTRIBUTION ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: PM-Distribution er distributør for Bladkompagniet A/S, og omdeler hver dag ca. 20.000 morgenaviser, ugeblade og magasinprodukter. Dette foregår i tidsrummet 0100-0730 365 dage om året.

HiringOrg.Name: PM-DISTRIBUTION ApS
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: PM-Distribution er distributør for Bladkompagniet A/S, og omdeler hver dag ca. 20.000 morgenaviser, ugeblade og magasinprodukter. Dette foregår i tidsrummet 0100-0730 365 dage om året.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Distributor of newspapers, letters, packages at night.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to work as a distributor at PM-Distribution, then it might be you we are looking for. It is a requirement that you can work at night, from 01.15 AM.

 

Tasks / functions 

Distribution of newspapers, magazines, letters, packages to private customers, in one of our areas:

 

Copenhagen Østerbro, 2100.

Copenhagen NV, 2400.

 

Qualifications / competences

 

  • Be able to show up at work.
  • Be committed to your work.
  • Be prepared to work at night.
  • Be able to work on your own.
  • Be able to ride a bike or scooter, as we will provide you with one of these. 
  • you must be a EU citizen to get the job

 

  • Working hours, workdays, and place
  • As a distributor at PM-Distribution, you are set to work 6 days a week.
  • You must be prepared to work on public holidays, as PM-Distribution is distributing 365 days a year.
  • The working hours are:
    • Monday-Friday, from 01:15 AM to 07:00 AM.
    • Saturday, Sunday, and holidays from 01:15 AM to 08:00 AM.

accommodation

  • room in apartment can be rented the first 3-4 months
